titles.title: To nullify a certain regulation regarding the operation of the Organ Procurement and Transplantation Network.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and Environment.

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services

bill.summary: 4/30/1998--Introduced. Declares that a specified final rule relating to the Organ Procurement and Transplantation Network has no legal effect. (The rule requires that: (1) organs be allocated among transplant candidates in order of decreasing medical urgency status, with waiting time in status used to break ties within status groups; and (2) neither place of residence nor place of listing be a major determinant of access to a transplant.)
